Shaping experiences, not just spaces

Midad Real Estate is more than a developer — we are storytellers of place. For over two decades, we have been redefining how communities live, connect, and grow across Saudi Arabia. Each project is crafted to go beyond structures, delivering value that resonates for generations.

Our Philosophy

Every project

is a legacy

in motion,

Every project

is a legacy

in motion,

We believe real estate is about impact — cultural, social, and economic. By blending innovation with authenticity, we create destinations that inspire pride, strengthen community bonds, and embody the Kingdom’s bold vision for the future.

Our Mission

Creating destinations with purpos

Our mission is to design and deliver world-class developments that enrich lives, attract global attention, and support Saudi Arabia’s transformation into a hub for business, tourism, and lifestyle.

We envision a Saudi Arabia where every city features destinations that are globally competitive yet distinctly local — places that are sustainable, innovative, and celebrated around the world.

Building the future, rooted in heritage

Our Vision
